data.description:
You have a QUANTUM DOUBLE, an intangible copy of your Drive. It has its own Speed (tracked separately), ignores all Impact and effects, and starts each encounter Matched to you.

Whenever you Boost, your QUANTUM DOUBLE can Boost instead, and when you attack with a Projected weapon or use its Pattern Trait, you can treat your QUANTUM DOUBLE as the origin for the effect.

When you Zero Out, your QUANTUM DOUBLE dissipates. If you Rally, it rematerializes Matched to you.
